metadata.title: CVE-2021-20293 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) flaw was found in RESTEasy in allversions of RESTEasy up to 4.6.0.Final, where it did not properly handleURL encoding when calling @javax.ws.rs.PathParam without any @ProducesMediaType. This flaw allows an attacker to launch a reflected XSS attack.The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality andintegrity.

criterions.comment: resteasy package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
resteasy3.0 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
